Anova World Token (ANW) is a blockchain-based platform on Binance Smart Chain designed to bridge traditional finance with decentralized technology. The project enables the tokenization of real-world assets (RWAs) such as stocks, real estate, commodities, and bonds into secure, tradable NFTs. Through oracle integrations, ANW provides real-time asset tracking and transparent valuation data, allowing users to diversify portfolios and manage tokenized assets efficiently. By simplifying access to global asset markets with instant settlements and low fees, Anova World Token aims to make real-world asset investment more inclusive, liquid, and borderless.
